DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate effect Lacosamide 200 mg twice day ( bid ) single dose pharmacokinetics ( PK ) pharmacodynamics ( PD ) Warfarin ( 25 mg ) healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Lacosamide 200 mg Twice Day ( Bid ) Single Dose Warfarin 25 mg Healthy Males
DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer 1855 year age BMI 18.030.0 kg/m2 weight least 50 kg Tympanic body temperature 35.037.5°C ( 95 99.5°F ) inclusive Volunteer participate participate clinical study investigational drug another Investigational Medicinal Product ( IMP ) within last 3 month Volunteer healthy ( eg , take drug treatment , excessive amount alcohol , cigarettes caffeine , medical emotional/psychological problem , drug/alcohol abuse , abnormal safety parameter ) Volunteer take Warfarin Non Steroidal AntiInflammatory Drug ( NSAID ) Volunteer history suicide attempt Volunteer history coagulation abnormality , occult blood stool , gastrointestinal ulcer , surgery within 6 month
